name: koa-power-router
description: Yet another router middleware for Koa, but better.

scripts.test: gulp lint && node --harmony node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --reporter nyan --bail --check-leaks test/index.js
scripts.test-travis: gulp lint && node --harmony node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks test/index.js

author: Chris Yip <i@chrisyip.im>
